channel.title: Tau Ceti Consulting
channel.description: Recent content on Tau Ceti Consulting

item.description: Welcome at TC2. TC2is a small consulting agency founded by Jos Polfliet. Contact To contact me E-mail info@tc2.dev. LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/jos-polfliet/ Twitter https://twitter.com/JosPolfliet Topics i’m interested in Machine Learning with a special interest in Natural Language Processing Sustainability. I am striving to living carbon neutral in 2020 and beyond. I accomplish that by trying to reducing my carbon footprint by mostly eating plant-based food and living close to work (10 min bike ride).
